name: World's End VR (MichaelAngelotti)
description:
Submission for the Unreal Engine 2019 Epic MegaJam. Theme: Down To Earth.

Play as a giant space guardian blocking incoming obstacles and fend off the fleet of space cats trying to make Earth their next litter box!

Compatibility: HTC Vive only

How To Play: Destroy the enemy ship and defend the Earth using  your shield to destroy rockets and asteroids.

Controls for game:
Grip       - Swap shield in hands
Menu    - Pull up Menu Controls
Trigger - When watch lights up, press trigger to launch atomic Frisbee.

Credits:

Programmer: Alex Hoffman

3D Modeler #1: Michael Angelotti

3D Modeler #2 / Voice Actor: Nick Sumrak
